PSCT.Base: If you have 3 or more "Salamangreat" monsters in your GY: You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster in your GY and 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; return that targeted monster from your GY to the Extra Deck, and if you do, destroy the targeted card on the field. If a card(s) in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone is destroyed and sent to the GY, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can only use 1 "Salamangreat Foxer" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
